text.section: A person is guilty of concealing the birth of an infant when he conceals the corpse of a newborn child with intent to conceal the fact of its birth or to prevent a determination of whether it was born dead or alive.
Concealing the birth of an infant is a Class A misdemeanor.

law.history: Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 259, effective January 1, 1975.
